title: BBC Local Live: Merseyside and west Cheshire on Thursday 5 January 2017 - BBC News
summary: fourth murder arrest over new brighton boxing day death .
everton reveal bramley moore dock as preferred stadium site .
councillors consider police request to limit birkenhead bars and off licences .
consultation to begin over plans for 1,600 new homes in knowsley .

documents.title: our live coverage across the day
text: live updates for merseyside and west cheshire have finished for the day , but we 'll be back from 08:00 on friday with more of the day 's news , sport , travel and weather .

documents.title: weather : cold and frosty evening ahead
text: chilly at first this evening but cloud will increase gradually , bringing a few spots of rain .
it 'll turn less cold although a frost is possible at first in st helens .
minimum temperature : -1c .
tomorrow outbreaks of locally heavy rain will spread across all parts during the morning , with light rain continuing through the day .
maximum temperature : 7c .
more from bbc weather
author: Charlie Slater
BBC Weather presenter

documents.title: jill saward : judge said impact on rape victim 'not so great '
text: liverpool-born jill saward , who has died aged 51 , was raped in 1986 when a gang broke into her home .

she spoke to the bbc in 2013 welcoming new guidelines on the sentencing of sex offenders in england and wales , telling bbc breakfast that the men who gang raped her were given the same sentence as for aggravated burglary .
and she said the judge had said the trauma suffered by her was `` not so very great '' .

documents.title: football : koeman 'expects a lot from ' lookman
text: everton manager ronald koeman says the toffees `` expect a lot from '' ademola lookman after the 19-year-old signed from charlton athletic for £ 11m .
author: BBC Sport

documents.title: man charged with burglaries in ellesmere port
text: police investigating burglaries in ellesmere port have charged a man over three incidents in hooton , neston and little sutton .
the 22-year old , from liverpool , was charged with two counts of burglary and one count of attempted burglary in december .

documents.title: voluntary 'bed tax ' tourism levy mooted for liverpool hoteliers
text: hotel owners in liverpool will be asked to pay a `` bed tax '' as part of a tourism levy , the city 's mayor has revealed .
joe anderson has said he is writing to hotel owners as part of a wider plan to generate more money for the city in the wake of a reduction in central government funding .
local authorities do not currently have the power to tax hotel stays and so it would require new legislation .
mr anderson said he would ask liverpool 's hoteliers for a `` voluntary contribution '' .

documents.title: latest headlines in merseyside and west cheshire
text: latest headlines in merseyside and west cheshire

documents.title: merseyside was so cold last night a lake is still frozen
text: merseyside was so cold last night the lake in central park , wirral froze over .
author: Liverpool Echo

documents.title: jill saward : how ealing vicarage case changed treatment of rape victims
text: in 1986 jill saward , who has died aged 51 , was raped after a gang of burglars broke into ealing vicarage where she lived .
her father , michael - the vicar of ealing - and her boyfriend were beaten with cricket bats by the men , who demanded money and jewellery .
it was a sexual attack which shocked the nation , became headline news and was subsequently labelled the `` ealing vicarage rape '' .

the media coverage of the case and the sentencing of the men who attacked ms saward - who was born in liverpool and later became jill drake - led to a public outcry about how rape victims were treated .
author: Cherry Wilson
BBC News

documents.title: lennon 's beatles forgeries sell at auction
text: an old newspaper with autographs of the beatles that were forged by john lennon has sold at auction for £ 2,000 .
a front page photo shows paul mccartney crowning the carnival queen in northwich , cheshire , in 1963 .
it was taken by photographer les goode and featured in alkali news - an in-house magazine for chemical company ici .
he sent it off to the beatles to be autographed , but john lennon signed it on behalf of all four band members .

documents.title: appeal for driver and passengers who fled scene of new year 's day crash
text: a car driver and passengers who fled the scene of a crash , which left a taxi driver with a broken spine , are wanted by police .
the crash happened near to the junction for mcdonald 's in edge lane , liverpool , just before 07:00 on new year 's day .
the taxi was carrying a family of four who were heading to the airport after staying in the city .
the taxi driver suffered a fractured spine and two passengers suffered minor injuries after the car flipped on to its roof .
a black audi a8 which was involved in the crash was abandoned by several occupants who fled the scene , police said .
anyone with information is asked to contact police .

documents.title: vicarage rape victim jill saward dies
text: a woman who became a sexual assault campaigner after she was raped during a burglary at her father 's vicarage in 1986 has died .
jill saward , then 21 , was sexually assaulted by two men in ealing , west london .
her boyfriend and father michael were severely beaten .
at the end of the trial of her rapists , the judge said her trauma `` had not been so great '' , sparking outrage .
born in liverpool , she was the first rape victim in the uk to waive her anonymity .

documents.title: latest headlines in merseyside and west cheshire
text: latest headlines in merseyside and west cheshire

documents.title: transgender woman found dead in cell
text: a transgender woman being held at a male prison while on remand has been found dead in her cell .
jenny swift , 49 , was found unresponsive at hmp doncaster , south yorkshire , on friday and later pronounced dead .
previously known as jonathan swift and from seaforth in sefton , merseyside , she was remanded in custody after a man was stabbed in november and later died .
an unnamed friend of hers said she had asked to be put into a women 's prison , the sheffield star reported .

documents.title: weather : cold but sunny afternoon
text: a cold afternoon with lots of winter sunshine .
staying dry with light winds .
highs of 4c .
more from bbc weather
author: BBC Weather

documents.title: southport shopping centre to be demolished and replaced by seven-storey hotel
text: marble place shopping centre in southport is set to be demolished and replaced by a new seven-storey hotel under radical plans submitted to sefton council .
author: Southport Visiter

documents.title: breakingfootball : everton sign charlton forward ademola lookman for £ 11m
text: everton have completed the £ 11m signing of charlton athletic 's teenage forward ademola lookman .
the 19-year-old joins on a four-and-a-half-year deal until june 2021 .
the england under-20 international has scored seven goals in 25 games in all competitions for league one charlton this season .
lookman said : `` it feels great to be an everton player .
as soon as i heard about everton 's interest i knew this would be the right place for me . ''
author: BBC Sport

documents.title: arrest after armed police surround walton home
text: a man has been arrested after armed police surrounded a house in liverpool .
the disturbance broke out in taylors lane , walton , just before 10:30 .
officers cordoned off the area amid reports the man inside was carrying a knife .
he has now been taken into custody for questioning .

documents.title: frustrations grow over car parking at junction station
text: plans to expand car parking facilities at st helens junction are being drawn up amidst frustration over increasing traffic congestion at the train station .
author: St Helens Star

documents.title: appeal to trace convicted rapist who fled uk after chester attack
text: a fresh appeal has been made to trace a convicted rapist who fled the country half way through his trial in warrington in september .
sultan amari , 46 , is refusing to return to the uk where he has been sentenced to imprisonment for raping a woman he took to a house in chester when he was working as a taxi driver .
police said leaving the country is not a way to escape justice .

documents.title: latest headlines in merseyside and west cheshire
text: latest headlines in merseyside and west cheshire

documents.title: widnes victoria cross hero honoured
text: a widnes wwi victoria cross hero is being honoured - 100 years since the act of bravery for which sergeant mottershead was awarded the victoria cross .
author: Runcorn and Widnes World

documents.title: boys , 15 , charged over norris green assault
text: two 15-year-old boys have been charged after a man was assaulted in norris green .
a 38-year-old man suffered head and chest injuries following an attack in broadway on 28 december .
the boys have been charged with assault and one of them has also been charged with threatening someone with a blade in a public place .
they are due to appear at liverpool youth court later .
a 16-year-old boy was charged with assault yesterday .

documents.title: calls to limit bars and off licences in birkenhead considered
text: councillors in wirral will meet later to consider a request by merseyside police to limit the number of bars and off licences in birkenhead - after an increase in alcohol-related crime .
officers said street drinkers in the charing cross area have been responsible for thefts from shops , but have also been victims themselves of attacks by gangs .

documents.title: rail : delayed service on merseyrail in wirral
text: there is a delayed service on merseyrail between birkenhead central and hooton due to a signalling problem .
latest from bbc travel
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: fourth murder arrest over new brighton boxing day death
text: a fourth person has been arrested on sus of murder after a man died following an assault in wirral on boxing day .
zac matthew wells , 30 , from liscard was left with head injuries following an attack in marine promenade , close to evo 's loft nightclub , in new brighton at about 03:45 .
he died in hospital yesterday .
a 19-year-old man , from egremont , is being questioning by police .
a man aged 29 , a 26-year-old woman and 16-year-old boy arrested yesterday remain in custody .

documents.title: latest headlines in merseyside and west cheshire
text: latest headlines in merseyside and west cheshire

documents.title: public views sought on knowsley garden village plan
text: a public consultation into a plan for a garden village with 1,600 homes on former green belt land in knowsley will start next week .
last night knowsley council 's cabinet agreed the public should be asked about the scheme to build a site called halsnead near whiston .
garden villages have been proposed for 14 sites across the country , which will each deliver between 1,500 and 10,000 properties .
the developments will be distinct new places , with their own community facilities , rather than extensions to existing urban areas , the government said .
green space campaigners have urged knowsley council to rethink the plans , but councillor graham morgan , cabinet member for regeneration , said the scheme will `` benefit the whole community '' .

documents.title: two banned from southport and west lancashire after gang injunction orders
text: two men have been permitted from entering southport and west lancashire after gang injunction orders were handed to them in court .
author: Southport Visiter

documents.title: football : injured everton winger bolasie could be out for a year , says ronald koeman
text: everton winger yannick bolasie could be out for a year with a knee injury , says manager ronald koeman .
bolasie , 27 , injured his right knee during the toffees ' 1-1 draw with manchester united on 4 december .
manager koeman said on wednesday : `` it will be around 11-12 months before he is back .
that is a big disappointment but he will come back . ''
bolasie is due to have a second operation - on his anterior cruciate ligament - in the coming weeks .
author: BBC Sport

documents.title: travel : rail replacement bus service between birkenhead and liverpool
text: the wirral loop line works started this week which means there is no service on merseyrail between birkenhead central and liverpool lime street , and between birkenhead north and liverpool lime street .
a replacement bus service is running at liverpool moorfields , at liverpool lime street and between birkenhead central and birkenhead north .
more from bbc travel
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: everton reveal bramley moore dock as preferred stadium site
text: everton 's preferred site for its proposed new stadium is bramley moore dock , the club 's chairman has said .
bill kenwright told shareholders at the club 's annual general meeting at the philharmonic hall on wednesday evening .
liverpool mayor joe anderson said the council would invest £ 20m ( $ 25m ) in a new road near the planned ground , alongside plans for a railway station .

text: latest headlines in merseyside and west cheshire
author: Jenny Coleman
Reporter, BBC Local Live

documents.title: weather : frosty start to a dry and bright day
text: a cold and frosty start to a dry , bright day with plenty of sunshine highs of 3c .
more from bbc weather
author: BBC Weather

documents.title: good morning : join us for today 's live news coverage
text: hello from liverpool , i 'm here with all your news , sport , travel and weather updates from across merseyside and west cheshire today .
if you 've got a story you 'd like me to hear about or a photograph you 'd like to share , you can contact me on email , facebook or twitter .
author: Jenny Coleman
Reporter, BBC Local Live
